content.text: Hi, I'm recently divorced and looking for some new friends.
Hi, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm always looking for new friends too.
Thanks, I'm trying to stay positive.
That's good. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, go to the movies, and spend time with my dog.
I like to go out to eat too, and I love animals. I have a dog and a cat.
That's great! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He's the best dog ever.
I love golden retrievers! I had one when I was growing up.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing to do with your dog?
I love to go for walks with him and play fetch in the park.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love playing fetch with my dog too.
Do you have any plans for this weekend?
I'm going to be spending the weekend working on my juicing bar business and trying to figure out how to advertise it to my neighbors.
That sounds like a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
It is, but I'm excited to see how it goes.
